ISSUE.TITLE: Add a new "PayPal Commerce" menu item
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80 Let's add a new "PayPal Commerce" menu item. The final breadcrumb will be in Admin area > Configuration >PayPal Commerce. It'll be located between "Web API" and "PayPal Zettle (POS)" menu items (related work item - https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/7263)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7264 PayPal Commerce plugin. Move menu item
